## Load Dataset

```{python}
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession, functions as F

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("LightcastData-A3").getOrCreate()

df = (spark.read
      .option("header", True)
      .option("inferSchema", True)
      .option("multiLine", True)
      .option("escape", "\"")
      .csv("Assignment03/data/lightcast_job_postings.csv"))

print("Rows:", df.count(), "Columns:", len(df.columns))
df.printSchema()
df.show(5, truncate=80)
